text: Anyone using this integration? curious if it works at the template level, or the individual email level <https://integrations.chamaileon.io/HubSpot/>

<@U22PKFRU5> Now that email is available for free users, are there any discussions on opening up the module/template marketplace to free users too? I.e., if I wanted free users to be able to buy/download email templates I made for the drag and drop editor. Just so that free users aren't limited to the 15 default templates?

It's a topic we're discussing, but I'm not sure it will happen anytime in the near future. We need to make sure we have a SUPER SOLID foundation + get all marketplace templates to work well with the drag-and-drop editor (not all play well as of today) before we open that up.

We consciously decided to keep it limited to start... and think about potentially expanding over time.

So it's possible, but there's still lots of foundational work before we'd get serious about open it up :slightly_smiling_face:
